alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Southeast Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 15 at 10:24PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow showers will affect east central Aroostook and north central Penobscot Counties... At 1022 PM EST...An area of heavy snow showers was near Scopan, or 21 miles southwest of Presque Isle...moving east AT 45 MPH. Locations impacted include... Presque Isle, Caribou, Houlton, Fort Fairfield, Limestone, Mapleton, Washburn, Mars Hill, Hodgdon, Ashland, Easton, Bridgewater, Smyrna, Masardis, Oxbow, Dudley Township, Scopan, Littleton, Monticello, and Oakfield. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 between mile markers 289 and 304. US Highway 1 between Houlton and Presque Isle. State Highway 11 between Knowles Corner and Squapan. * Sudden and brief snowfall rates of up to 1 inch per hour are possible in this area of heavy snow showers.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Southeast Aroostook
